tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: We're so pleased to recognize Ralph Bunche as one of @StateDept's #HeroesofUSDiplomacy honorees. Learn more about the initi…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: We're so pleased to recognize Ralph Bunche as one of @StateDept's #HeroesofUSDiplomacy honorees. Learn more about the initiative and Bunche here: go.usa.gov/xdB3n. #BlackHistoryMonth #UN75 twitter.com/USUN/status/12…
